projects.name: DimeDefender
projects.description: Chrome extension that helps users improve financial habits and reduce impulse purchases. Blocks checkout on Amazon and Shopify while the user watches an AI cutscene.

projects.name: MpoxMap
projects.description: An interactive map-based dashboard tracking the spread of Mpox cases globally, providing visualizations and historical data insights for public health awareness.

projects.name: UWFE Dashboard
projects.description: A custom driver dashboard developed for the University of Waterloo Formula Electric team to enhance driver experience with real-time car diagnostics and debugging.

projects.name: GameWave
projects.description: A mock videogame marketplace, where users can get sign up for recommendations based on their interests, and leave reviews for games they've played.
